Table 3.  World Region and Country or Area of Birth of the Foreign-Born Population: 1960 to 2000
(See text for sources, definitions, and explanations)
* Indicates sample data. (NA) Not available. n.e.c. Not elsewhere classified.
1 In 2000, for the first time, includes imputed data on country of birth if country of birth was not reported.  Born at sea included with not reported.
2 In 2000, data for Portugal (total) include Madeira Islands.
3 Data for the former Soviet Union include the part in Asia, as shown in this table under Asia.
4 In 1960 and 1970, data for China include Taiwan.  In source for 2000 census data, a total is shown also for China including Hong Kong and
5 In 2000, data for Palestine (shown separately in 1990) included in Asia n.e.c.
6 In 1960 and 1970, data shown for Cape Verde are for Other Atlantic Islands.
